folder: Henry Street & Hamilton Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Henry Street, north from Hamilton Avenue. The houses on the east side of Henry Street were demolished for the widening of Hamilton Avenue and its reconstruction into Brooklyn's northerly extension of the Belt Parkway. In the center background is Public School No. 142.

View 3 is north from 9th Street.

October 13, 1940
Views 1, 2, 3

P. L. Sperr

folder: Henry Street & Hamilton Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Henry Street, south from and across Hamilton Avenue, showing numerous buildings being razed for the widening of Hamilton Avenue and its conversion into Gowanus Parkway, a link in the Belt Parkway system of roads.
View 2 is north from near Nelson Street.
P. L. Sperr  October 23, 1940
NO REPRODUCTIONS  Views 1,2

folder: Nelson Street & Hamilton Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Nelson Street, east from Hamilton Avenue. Hamilton Avenue is shown being widened as part of Brooklyn's northerly extension of the Belt Parkway; numerous tenements were torn down for that purpose.
October 23, 1940
P. L. Sperr

folder: Hamilton Avenue & Nelson Street, Brooklyn, NY
text:
